titleStmt.title: A sermon, preached at Edinburgh in the Parliament-House, November 17th, 1700, before his Grace, James, Duke of Queensberry, his Majesties High Commissioner; and many of the nobility, barrons, burrows, members of the High Court of Parliament, / by David Williamson minister of the Gospel, at West-Kirk.
titleStmt.author: Williamson, David, d. 1706.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Mosman, and are to be sold at his shop in the Parliament-Clos,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
